interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2023/02/18
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Karen Leigh Hopkins'], 'Producers': ['Rob Carliner', 'Eric Brenner'], 'Starring': ['Katie Holmes', 'James Badge Dale', 'Callan Mulvey']}
Review Text: When actors produce movies we get very different movies. Different from Hollywood versions. This slice of life with a tilted twist movie and an understated romance marry with the dark memories of a childhood lost to violence. We really don't know who anyone is until they choose to reaveal what made them who they are today.
Review Title: Macabre
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
